ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Residential Property', NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(TotalSellingPrice__c), NOT(ISBLANK(TotalSellingPrice__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PreLaunchPrice__c)), TotalSellingPrice__c < PreLaunchPrice__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Total Selling Price" cannot be less than the Deal Amount
